Interface SourceFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSourceFactory, BerkeleyDbSourceFactory, InMemorySourceFactory
public interface SourceFactory

smorrissey

Method Detail

getSource

Source getSource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                 String name)
                 throws IOException,
                        JHOVE2Exception
Get source unit from a formatted object name, which can be a file, a. directory, or a URL. Note that a URL source unit requires the creation of a temporary file.

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
name - Formatted object name
Returns:
File, Directory, or URL Source unit
Throws:
IOException - I/O exception instantiating source
JHOVE2Exception

                 throws IOException,
                        JHOVE2Exception

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
file - Java File
Returns:
File or Directory source unit
Throws:
IOException - I/O exception instantiating source
JHOVE2Exception

getSource

                 URL url)
                 throws IOException,
                        JHOVE2Exception
Get URL source unit from a URL by creating a local temporary file.

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object

Returns:
URL source unit
Throws:
IOException - I/O exception instantiating source
JHOVE2Exception

getSource

Source getSource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                 InputStream inputStream,
                 String name,
                 Reportable otherProperties)
                 throws IOException,
                        JHOVE2Exception
Get a source unit from an inputstream by creating a temporary file Used for example to create soure unit from a Zip file entry

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
inputStream - InputStream containing contents of Source
name - file name Stream would have within original container
otherProperties - non-file system reportable features associated with source
Returns:
Source unit
Throws:
IOException
JHOVE2Exception

getSource

Source getSource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                 String name,
                 String... names)
                 throws IOException,
                        JHOVE2Exception
Get FileSet source unit from a formatted object name, which can be a file, a. directory, or a URL. Note that a URL source unit requires the creation of a temporary file.

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
name - First formatted object name
names - Remaining formatted object names
Returns:
FileSet source unit
Throws:
IOException - I/O exception instantiating source
JHOVE2Exception

getSource

Source getSource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                 List<String> names)
                 throws IOException,
                        JHOVE2Exception
Make FileSetSource from list of formatted objects, which may be files, directories, and URLS. Note that URL source units require the creation of temporary files.

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
names - Formatted object names
Returns:
FileSet source
Throws:
IOException
JHOVE2Exception

                                     Source parent,
                                     long offset,
                                     long size,
                                     String name)
                                     throws IOException,
                                            JHOVE2Exception
Utility method to create ByteStreamSource

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
parent - Parent source unit
offset - Starting offset
size - Size
name - Name, if known
Returns:
ByteStream source unit

JHOVE2Exception

getDirectorySource

DirectorySource getDirectorySource(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                                   String name,
                                   boolean isFileSystemDirectory)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          JHOVE2Exception
Utility method to create empty non-file system DirectorySource

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 framework object
name - Directory name
isFileSystemDirectory - boolean indicating if Directory is "actual" or just "virtual" artifact of source processing
Returns:
Directory source unit
Throws:
IOException
JHOVE2Exception

createSourceAccessor

SourceAccessor createSourceAccessor(Source source)
Create SourceAccessor for this SourceFactory type This will be different, for example, for each persistence model

Parameters:
Source - for which accessor is to be created
Returns:
SourceAccessor
